results.title: Effect of Metformin Alone Compared with Metformin Plus Simvastatin on Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome in Pakistani Women.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To determine the efficacy of metformin alone versus @CHEMICAL_Metformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ plus @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ for treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Polycystic_Kidney_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007690 @@@polycystic ovariansyndrome@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Polycystic_Kidney_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007690 @@@PCOS@@@).
